imdb.title: Manyuu hikenchou
imdb.plot: In Edo period of Japan, a clan known as the Manyuu, with ability of a sword strike that could shrink the size of a woman's breasts. This might not seem like an ability that could rule a land, but their large breasts, denote status...

episodes.title: Kaede's Chifusa-sama Breast Growth Record 2

episodes.title: Chifusa Defects
episodes.plot: In a world in which having large breasts means everything, the successor of the powerful Manyuu family, Chifusa Manyuu, defects and steals the Manyuu Scroll of Secrets, but is wounded during her escape.

episodes.title: Assassin! Breast Illusion
episodes.plot: Running low on money, Chifusa and Kaede earn some money by utilizing Chifusa's assets. They go to an inn run by a well-endowed landlady.

episodes.plot: Having not eaten for days, Chifusa and Kaede get a job at a maid bar.

episodes.title: Divers and Breasts

episodes.title: Good-For-Nothings and Breasts
episodes.plot: Chifusa and Kaede save a woman called Osuzu from four "monsters" that assaulted her and tried to molest her breasts.

episodes.title: Chifusa Imprisoned
episodes.plot: Chifusa and Kaede run into Lord Hatomune Mie, who has escaped from his palace and disguised himself as a commoner to live a simple life in a village, where he has become a popular citizen.

episodes.title: Bud of Love
episodes.plot: While traveling through the forest, Kaede and Chifusa save a painter called Sakuji Itamune from a trio of Manyuu guards who wanted to kill him because of the content of his art.

episodes.title: The First Breast Slice
episodes.plot: Chifusa and Kaede rest for the night in an abandoned shack after Chifusa comes down with a fever.

episodes.title: Breast Flow
